Description: Model oil-lamp made of sheet tin with inset glass panels. Lamp stands on openwork circular base with cylindrical holder for wick inside. Four panels decorated in red and purple paint. Openwork upper section with loop handle secured through top of lamp with wire.
Curator's comments: Oil lamps such as this are carried by children at Ramadan.
Acquisition notes: Af1990,10.1 to 14 were purchased from Delia Pemberton. It is described in the purchase book as "A small collection of contemporary material from Egypt and Tunisia, including amuletic hangings, Ramadan lamps, clay figures and cloth dolls".
